thread.title: MS Board of Education seeks to measure school contractor effectiveness
thread.title_full: MS Board of Education seeks to measure school contractor effectiveness

author: Frank Corder
title: MS Board of Education seeks to measure school contractor effectiveness
text: State seeks to measure effectiveness of school contractors State officials say they're trying to measure whether struggling school districts are getting good results from contractors hired to help teachers and students. In a presentation Thursday to the State Board of Education, Jamilliah Longino said that the state's Office of School Improvement has begun meeting quarterly with contractors to 26 school districts. WLOX Posted October 15, 2015 - 10:40 pm YallPolitics.Com now uses Facebook for comments. Log into Facebook to comment here.
